trans-unit.source: Defines methods that decrypt an XrML <see langword="<encryptedGrant>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 定義解密 XrML <see langword="<encryptedGrant>" /> 項目的方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.IRelDecryptor> interface with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform> class to decrypt an XrML `<encryptedGrant>` element.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.IRelDecryptor>介面<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform>類別，以解密 XrML`<encryptedGrant>`項目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to validate an XML digital signature using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.IRelDecryptor> interface and the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何驗證 XML 數位簽章使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.IRelDecryptor>介面和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform>類別。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod" /> object that encapsulates the algorithm used for XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: 封裝了 XML 加密 (Encryption) 所使用的演算法之 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo" /> object that contains an asymmetric key to use for decryption.
trans-unit.target: 含有解密所需之非對稱金鑰的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A stream object that contains an <see langword="<encryptedGrant>" /> element to decrypt.
trans-unit.target: 含有欲解密之 <see langword="<encryptedGrant>" /> 項目的資料流物件。

trans-unit.source: Decrypts an XrML <see langword="<encryptedGrant>" /> element that is contained within a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件內所含的 XrML <see langword="<encryptedGrant>" /> 項目解密。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object that contains a decrypted <see langword="<encryptedGrant>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 含有已解密之 <see langword="<encryptedGrant>" /> 項目的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.IRelDecryptor.Decrypt%2A> method decrypts an XrML `<encryptedGrant>` element and returns a plaintext stream.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.IRelDecryptor.Decrypt%2A>方法解密 XrML`<encryptedGrant>`項目，並傳回純文字資料流。
